description:
Standing in Koichi’s way is none other than his nemesis: Moritsugu Reiji.  Blasting forward, Moritsugu is prepared to show Koichi and company their inexperience and lack of power, compared to his.  Unable to gain enough power and strength against Moritsugu, Koichi is left almost helpless.  As Vardant’s violent battle ensues, will Linebarrel be able to show off its power?
Source: crunchyroll
